cli.command.logout_help: Log out of your YeetFile account
cli.command.vault_help: Manage files and folders in your YeetFile Vault
cli.command.pass_help: Manage passwords in your YeetFile Password Vault
cli.command.send_help: Create an end-to-end encrypted shareable link to a file or text
cli.command.download_help: Download a file or text uploaded via YeetFile Send
cli.error.no_connection: Unable to connect to the server
cli.error.no_login: You are not logged in. Use the 'login' or 'signup' commands to continue.
cli.error.missing_var:
Missing '%[1]s' environment variable
You must include the value returned for this variable either in your shell
config file (.bashrc, .zshrc, etc), run 'export %[1]s=xxxx' in your current
session, or prefix commands with the variable (i.e. %[1]s=xxxx yeetfile vault)
cli.config.error.no_keys: key files do not exist in config dir
cli.config.error.no_wordlist: wordlist files do not exist in config dir
cli.config.error.out_of_date: server info is out of date
